title: Left Click just suddenly changed to MB3
body:
so ive researched on youtube and saw many threads but idek what has happened.

basically i usually left click on the mini map and it instantly lets me see it, now i left click on the map and nothing happens...

i usually left click on a champ or minion to see the health etc but now nothing happens

i can still left click and buy stuff in store but everything else doesn't work.

tried the input config stuff on textedit as i am on MACbook PRO retina , still doesn't work

now i have to use MB3 to click on the map and to click on champs


BASICALLy, mb3 and left click swap controls.. 

i use smart cast and its fine, but i use normal cast for wards and basically when i click 4, a green button shows up (indicator) so i can place my ward, but ofc my LEFT click doesnt work and have to use mb3

please need help desperate

replies.body:
That's pretty weird!  Something like this could happen if your config was modified or became corrupt.  You mentioned input config stuff but I'm not totally sure what that means.  To be certain, your best bet would be a[ config reset](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761934-Mouse-and-Keyboard-Issues#mq2).

If that doesn't work, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will look into this with you individually.  I hope that helps!
